name: I have had a very hard time concentrating on work or enjoying life with all of this hanging in the balance. I'd like to think that we've all learned something as a country, and that things won't unfold like they did in 2016, but I am terrified that we'll have the same result – all of the polls indicating a Trump loss, followed by an electoral college victory for him without the support of the popular vote. I hope and pray for a resounding, deafening rebuke of Trumpism with a massive landslide victory for Biden and Democrats... but I expect a tight race to the finish.
